bibl.title: Dispatch from Robert Cunningham to William H. Seward
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

opener.dateline:
United States Commercial Agency
Loanda 30th September 1861

div1.p:
Sir
Herewith I enclose Returns from this Commercial Agency for the Quarter ending 30th September 1861. The several accounts and Certificates I have directed to the Treasury Department and have drawn on the Honorable Secretary of the Treasury for $205. 84/100 being balance of my Salary for that Quarter.
I have the honor to acknowledge receipt of Despatches of 16 & 17th July last addressed to J. G. Willis Esq having Reference to Salary and Consular fees.

closer.signed:
Robert Cunningham
acting U S Com Agent
